title: Landing Page Dark Mode Continuity
description: Verify that the landing page displays a continuous dark mode visual experience with no visual breaks or inconsistent color shifts throughout all sections on both desktop and mobile devices.

steps.description: Open the landing page on a desktop browser.
Check that all sections maintain a consistent dark mode color palette without visible color transitions or breaks.
Resize the browser or use mobile emulation to simulate mobile devices.
Confirm continuous dark mode is preserved and consistent on all viewport sizes.

title: Typography Hierarchy Verification
description: Check that typography sizes meet requirements, specifically that desktop titles range between 48px to 56px, ensuring visual hierarchy is consistent across the landing page.

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page on desktop viewport.
Verify that all main titles have font sizes between 48px and 56px.
Ensure subheadings and paragraph texts follow a clear hierarchy consistent with minimalistic design.

title: Hero Section Content and CTA Interaction
description: Validate the Hero section includes a prominent badge, headline, subheadline, and two CTAs (default and outline). Verify both CTAs are interactive and navigate appropriately (placeholder links).

steps.description: Load the landing page and locate the Hero section.
Confirm presence of a prominent badge, headline, and subheadline text content.
Locate both CTAs, verify their display styles (default and outline).
Click each CTA button one by one.
Check that clicking the CTAs triggers the expected placeholder navigation or event.

title: Posicionamento Section Layout and Content
description: Ensure the Posicionamento section displays a strong title with a vertical line and a concise paragraph, all in continuous dark mode styling.

steps.description: Scroll to the Posicionamento section on the landing page.
Verify the title includes a vertical line to its side styled appropriately.
Check the title text is strong and visually distinct.
Confirm the paragraph below the title is concise and is styled consistent with dark mode colors.

title: O Que Criamos Section Grid Integrity
description: Validate that the O Que Criamos section displays exactly 12 items arranged in a 3x4 grid, each item showing only a minimalist title without any descriptions.

steps.description: Locate the O Que Criamos section by scrolling.
Count that there are exactly 12 items displayed.
Check the grid layout matches 3 columns and 4 rows.
Verify each item displays only a title text with no accompanying description.

title: Diferenciais Section Cards and Hover Effects
description: Verify the Diferenciais section includes exactly three premium cards, each having a title and brief description. Confirm presence of subtle linear hover light effect and stagger animation on load.

steps.description: Scroll to the Diferenciais section.
Verify that there are exactly three cards present.
Check each card includes a clearly visible title and a brief description.
Hover over each card one by one.
Confirm the presence of subtle linear hover light animation on hover.
Reload the page and observe the initial load animation of these cards.
Ensure the stagger fade-up animation runs smoothly on page load or section entry.

title: Processo Section Step Display and Connector
description: Check that the Processo section displays five steps with large floating numbers (1 to 5) and a discreet vertical connector line linking them, styled in line with the dark mode palette.

steps.description: Locate the Processo section.
Verify five steps are shown with large, prominent floating numeric labels from 1 to 5.
Check presence of a vertical connector line connecting the steps respectfully and styled discreetly.
Confirm that styling matches continuous dark mode palette.

title: Projetos Section Cards Interactivity and Hover Effect
description: Validate that the Projetos section displays exactly five clickable minimalist cards, each with subtle border glow effects on hover. Clicking each card triggers the appropriate placeholder action.

steps.description: Scroll to the Projetos section.
Check that there are exactly five cards.
Verify each card is clickable.
Hover over each card.
Confirm subtle border glow effect (#1a1a1a color) appears smoothly on hover.
Click each card individually.
Check that clicking triggers a placeholder navigation or event.

title: Planos Section Pricing Table and CTA Functionality
description: Verify the Planos section shows three price plans START, GROW (highlighted), and SCALE with detailed features listed. Each plan card includes a call-to-action button that works with placeholder links.

steps.description: Locate the Planos pricing section.
Verify presence of three distinct pricing plans named START, GROW and SCALE.
Confirm that the GROW plan is visually highlighted compared to the others.
Check each plan displays detailed feature lists appropriately.
Click the CTA button on each pricing plan.
Verify each CTA triggers the assigned placeholder navigation or scheduling action.

title: Final CTA Section Call-to-Action
description: Verify the final CTA section displays a strong call phrase and a clearly visible scheduling button, with the button interactive and triggering the expected placeholder action.

steps.description: Scroll to the Final CTA section.
Confirm presence of a strong, concise call phrase encouraging scheduling.
Check that the scheduling button is ultra-minimalistic and prominent.
Click the scheduling button.
Verify the button triggers a placeholder scheduling function or navigation.

title: Footer Brand and Information Display
description: Check the footer is minimalistic and displays brand and basic information correctly with consistent dark mode styling.

steps.description: Scroll to the bottom of the landing page to view the footer.
Verify brand name or logo is present in the footer.
Check for basic information area content such as copyright or contact info.
Confirm footer colors conform to continuous dark mode palette.

title: Animation Wrapper and Scroll Animation Hook Execution
description: Validate that smooth fade-up and staggered animations activate properly on section entries using IntersectionObserver and the useScrollAnimation hook under varied scroll behaviors.

steps.description: Load the landing page and slowly scroll down through each section.
Observe that each section's fade-up and stagger animations trigger smoothly upon entering the viewport.
Scroll quickly back and forth to test animation re-triggering where applicable.
Ensure no erratic or janky animations occur and all remain smooth and performant.

title: Accessibility Compliance Check - Contrast and Semantic Structure
description: Verify accessibility standards are met including AA contrast level for text and interactive elements, semantic heading structure with one unique H1 and proper H2 for sections, and keyboard navigation usability.

steps.description: Use accessibility testing tools or manual inspection to analyze color contrast ratios for text and buttons.
Confirm all text and UI elements meet AA contrast standards.
Inspect HTML markup or use accessibility tree tools to verify unique single H1 heading exists.
Check section headings use semantic H2 tags appropriately.
Navigate through all interactive elements using keyboard Tab and Shift+Tab keys.
Ensure all CTAs and interactive cards are reachable, visible focus outlines appear, and usability is intact.

title: SEO Metadata and Structure Validation
description: Verify the landing page SEO best practices are implemented properly including unique H1, distinct H2 headings for each section, and meta tags for performance and indexing.

steps.description: Inspect the page source to locate the single unique H1 heading.
Confirm all main content sections contain semantic H2 headings with descriptive text.
Review meta tags such as title, description, viewport, and robots in the HTML head.
Ensure they align with SEO best practices for a landing page.

title: Performance Benchmark - Lighthouse Scores
description: Check the landing page meets or exceeds Lighthouse benchmarks: Performance score greater than 85, Accessibility above 90, and SEO above 90.

steps.description: Run Lighthouse audit on desktop and mobile for the landing page.
Verify Performance score is > 85.
Verify Accessibility score is > 90.
Verify SEO score is > 90.

title: Responsive Layout Verification Across Devices
description: Ensure all landing page sections (Hero, Posicionamento, O Que Criamos, Diferenciais, Processo, Projetos, Planos, Final CTA, Footer) adapt seamlessly to different viewport sizes including desktop, tablet, and mobile with no layout breaking or content clipping.

steps.description: Load the landing page in various viewport sizes or device simulators (desktop, tablet, mobile).
Verify that all sections are fully visible with correct alignment and spacing.
Confirm grid layouts, typography, and CTAs scale and reposition appropriately without overlap or clipping.
Check interactive elements remain accessible and usable on all device viewports.
